name: Throw bricks at pendestrians and survive the bricks that appear from heaven with Gabesonic
name_original: Throw bricks at pendestrians and survive the bricks that appear from heaven with Gabesonic
description: If you kill any stickman then a brick will come from the heavens and will be thrown at you randomly but this time I allow you to dodge the bricks and with pizza tower music too, why not? Press c to dodge too, also credits to @dogeiscut on scratch for his og project.
